text: Grega Sorčan (born 5 March 1996) is a Slovenian footballer who plays for Domžale. ==Professional career== Sorčan made his professional debut with Triglav Kranj in a 3–0 loss against Rudar Velenje on 3 August 2013. He briefly transferred to Chievo in the Italian Serie A, before returning to Gorica as a starting goalkeeper. ==International career== Sorčan was a youth international for Slovenia. ==References== ==External links== *Soccerway profile *PrvaLiga profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Kranj Category:Slovenian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Slovenia youth international footballers Category:Slovenia under-21 international footballers Category:NK Triglav Kranj players Category:A.C. title: Grega Sorčan
